titles.title: A resolution honoring the memory of the victims of the heinous attack at the Pulse nightclub on June 12, 2016.
A resolution honoring the memory of the victims of the heinous attack at the Pulse nightclub on June 12, 2016.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
This resolution commemorates the 49 victims killed in the attack at the Pulse nightclub in Orlando, Florida, on June 12, 2016.
It also offers heartfelt condolences to the families, loved ones, and friends of the victims.
